distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libX11 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-43786: Fixed stack exhaustion from infinite recursion in PutSubImage() (bsc#1215684).
- CVE-2023-43787: Fixed integer overflow in XCreateImage() leading to a heap overflow (bsc#1215685).
- CVE-2023-43785: Fixed out-of-bounds memory access in _XkbReadKeySyms() (bsc#1215683).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to a boundary condition within the _XkbReadKeySyms() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger an out-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to an infinite loop within the PutSubImage() function. This flaw allows a local user to consume all available system resources and cause a denial of service condition.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to an integer overflow within the XCreateImage() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.
notes.title: CVE description
